name: Space 50
description:
Space 50 is a small vertical scroll 2D shooting game based off a mix between Space Invaders and a simple bullet hell.

Controls

Desktop:

  • Arrow keys or WASD keys: Move the player.
  • Space bar: Fires. Can be pressed or holded.
  • ESC: Pauses the game.
  • Mouse: Navigation on menues.

Android:

  • Click and drag spaceship: Moves the player and fires.

Preview for Android
